Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.16 Hetuduka, Maggārammaṇattika » 1.16.2 Maggahetukapada » 1.16.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Maggārammaṇattika
Maggahetukapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
467.
1023Hetu maggahetuko dhammo hetussa maggahetukassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
468.
1024Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1025Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1026Nahetupaccayā adhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1027(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-adhipatiup1.16.3 Maggādhipatipada >>
